statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -6 \\ -15 \\ 17 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 20 \\ 3 \\ 36 \\ -37 \\ -9 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
